pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.html:
@shaunj will need to be the one who tests a lot of this, but things I can see so far:

  • Some of the queue manager status messages have lost information. In my view that information was useful (for example: if you're not watching the experiment, it is useful to know whether the hardware failed mid experiment or during programming).
  • The code that loads shots into the queue after clicking the button should a) accept files with extension .hdf5 and b) actually confirm the filepaths end with .h5 and .hdf5 since Qt actually fails completely at doing that check, even though it's specified. See the 10 or so lines starting here
